scripts.deploy-dev-branch: DEV=true BRANCH_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && BUILD=development npx nuxi generate --dotenv .env.development && aws --profile scorecard s3 sync .output/public s3://scorecard-development-9d7y2giuzkhar2vn94xb/$BRANCH_NAME --exclude '*.DS_Store' && aws --profile scorecard cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2PKIP6XK74A9G --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy-dev: DEV=true npx nuxi generate --dotenv .env.development && aws --profile scorecard s3 sync .output/public s3://scorecard-development-9d7y2giuzkhar2vn94xb --exclude '*.DS_Store' && aws --profile scorecard cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2PKIP6XK74A9G --paths '/*'
